website_summaries.verdict: A nice assortment that's fun for dogs who love to chew and play. They are reasonably sturdy, but they are not indestructible.
pros: Durable rope toys in different shapes and sizes for medium and large dogs
Suitable for puppies with the urge to chew
Made of cotton material that is easy to clean in the washing machine
cons: Very aggressive chewers can destroy them
Tend to shed threads when frayed from chewing and playing

website_summaries.verdict: Collection of 5 different rope toys in one set to keep even bored dogs entertained.
pros: Perfect set of rope toys for medium and large dogs, as these toys are bigger than what's commonly found in sets
Rope toys use 100% natural cotton that is safe for dogs
Toys are tough enough to stand up to games of tug or fetch
cons: A couple of the toys have a few plastic pieces on them

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed within 15 minutes. Fake reviews.
customer_reviews.text: You know a product's reviews are fake or incentivized when you have people leaving 5-stars proclaiming they're of "amazing quality!" and the "best toys for aggressive chewers." Package arrived at 3:00 PM. I opened it up and gave to my 1 year old Belgian Malinois around 3:15 PM. Destroyed by 3:30 PM.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Good value for what I payed
customer_reviews.text: Good value for what I payed, but my 8 month old german shepherd ate through all but the one with plastic attached in about 5 days. Gonna look in a different direction next time
customer_reviews.author: erik

customer_reviews.title: A must for your doggie toy box!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST!!! The quality is amazing!! The ropes are thick and tight! I love the different shapes, the wreath, the 8 shape with ball, rope with knots and the ball!! You get far less quality for other toys at far more cost. 5 very high quality toys! I have a Great Dane mix and Great Dane pup and they have so much fun with these ropes together and alone. So worth getting! It is a must for your doggie toy box!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Ropes that keep giving
customer_reviews.text: I have an aggressive chewer. I bought the stuffed toys that were for aggressive chewers but the toys only lasted a couple of days. I decided to try these rope toys. They are fantastic. I bought them in January and they are still going strong. Love them and a good valve.
customer_reviews.author: Frosty Moon

customer_reviews.title: Not indestructible
customer_reviews.text: Within a 15 minutes, the dog had one of the toys almost completely cut in half and had begun pulling out strands of rope and eating it. Not durable at all. The only upside is, there are 5 different toys to destroy and leave scattered throughout my home. The toys do seem well built and made out of good material but looks can be deceiving. Don’t get me wrong this dog likes to chew, but any toy should last longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: lungehunter

customer_reviews.title: ... have two Aussies (5 months and 2 yrs) that love to play
customer_reviews.text: We have two Aussies (5 months and 2 yrs) that love to play, and rope toys are one of their favorites. These ropes are not indestructible against vigorous play, but have shown the best durability compared to several other varieties/brands we have tried. It can become necessary to trim strands as they begin to unravel (the twisted braid ring seem to come apart the most readily), but that's not a huge problem. Our satisfaction with these has prompted a second order of the multi-pack. Will purchase again as necessary, probably in another 4-5 months given how things have gone so far. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: ECMWF

customer_reviews.title: Makes My Dogs Vomit
customer_reviews.text: I have several German Shepherds. They love rope toys and rope balls. They always manage to chew them up and swallow some string before I notice and take them away. The rope toys from the pet stores (PetCo/PetSmart) and Walmart don't cause any trouble. When my dogs swallow a little string from these toys, they throw up and get diarrhea. If you give these to your pet, you'll need to be extra careful to throw them out at any sign of damage.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Less Than an Hour
customer_reviews.text: The product came nicely packaged. I was excited knowing my 8 month old Goldendoodle would love these. He did! The PROBLEM is that the first rope toy out of the group lasted 20 minutes at best. I saw the whole thing unraveling and strings coming apart. I'm glad I was nearby for gear he could have choked. I decided to try another rope out of the package. The design concept is great, but the rope itself just doesn't last and it too began to unravel and come apart. These will be going back immediately!
customer_reviews.author: AbDan

customer_reviews.title: good deal on these
customer_reviews.text: These toys are surprisingly durable. i have a power chewer who is 5 years old and a new puppy who is teething so I needed something that wouldn't get torn up quickly.. its been a little over a week and the first two that i took out of the package are still in tact.. The rest are on top of the fridge for replacement when the others wear out.. If i were to go to Tractor Supply or a pet store to get these it would have cost around 70.00 so a very good deal on these.
customer_reviews.author: casey Matteson McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Good for medium dogs and large teething puppies
customer_reviews.text: I have a Basset /Blue Heeler aka Basset Heeler, she's about 37 lbs, 1.5 yrs and loves to chew. I keep a bag of these toys on hand and just let her chew to her hearts content, it keeps her from chewing anything else, plus she loves them and carries them from her crate through the rest of the house. I cut off the excess twine so they last a bit longer, and then toss them when they are useless. My last dog was a pit and she would have chewed though these really fast, but she would have enjoyed it! Good for larger puppies that are just going to chew no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Some are great, some not so much
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs - a Bernese-Poodle mix, and a Bichon-Poodle mix. They love to play, and the smaller typically outlasts the larger. They LOVED these ropes, until they started to fray. Once this happened, they went NUTS, shredding the ropes into little bits. The only two pieces of this set that have survived since purchase (less than four months) is the rope and the figure 8 chew toy - the rest have been obliterated. I would have likely bought those two pieces alone, but i was a little disappointed by how soon some of the pieces began to fray and fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan W

customer_reviews.title: Ropes Durable but NOT the Blue Plastic center in big one
customer_reviews.text: My Golden Retriever - age 6 - chewed a big hunk out of the blue plastic center of big one in just the first few minutes and he fortunately does not swallow pieces but I took it away to be safe. Also having frilly loose threads at ends are chewed off and strewn all over the carpet. I have to keep those trimmed off. Also cannot give him soft squeaky toys as he rips them open - cotton stuffing is pulled out and strewn everywhere until he gets the prize squeaker out. The only safe toys are rubber balls/tennis balls and tough ropes with him.
customer_reviews.author: GRIN-N-BARRETT

customer_reviews.title: My 9mos old Pitt Bull loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is a red nose brindle Pitt Bull and weighs 45lbs. She goes to her toy box and drags them all out 1 by 1. They entertain her for hours. Although the plastic ball attached to 1 of them didn't last long, she shredded it. The ropes themselves are heavy duty and better than the ones I've found at pets-mart and other places. They're cheaper also. I've paid over $17 for just 1 rope toy and it wasn't this high a quality. I'll be buying more soon. She plays tug of war, fetch, chewing on them and tossing them around. She's a very sweet dog and to watch her playing with them brings her and me great joy.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: These toys are meant to be destroyed!
customer_reviews.text: I love getting these toys because they keep my house (and the things in it) in one piece. They get torn apart and they make a HUGE mess but my dogs love them and these keep them busy. For those reviewers that complain about durability seem to miss the point of these toys. They are meant to be destroyed and let's face it, they are made of cotton thread, so how long would you really expect them to last? Good value and happy dogs. When these are completely done, I will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Large Dog Chew Toys! Clean Teeth/NOT Good to Consume! Supervision Suggested
customer_reviews.text: Great chew toys for larger dog! We have an 85 lb Golden Retriever, who is very committed to his chewing up all toys IMMEDIATELY! These are lasting fairly decently, but understand, some dogs, ours included are JUST GONNA CHEW! The vet told us he does have really clean, tartar free teeth last week! Lol! Wonder why because we don’t brush them! (I will say the vet says “no-no on him chewing up and swallowing lots of these cotton strings!) We give our large dogs this and do supervise.
customer_reviews.author: J. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap price and keeps my Lab mix busy so she won’t chew up my shoes! She ripped one up the first night but is still playing with the same one a week later but that’s why I bought them. I don’t expect them to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: bhvinva

customer_reviews.title: Great variety pack for heavy chewers
customer_reviews.text: The variety pack is the way to go! The different sizes and shapes let my pup choose how he wants to play. Each toy is fun and special in a new way for him. The rope seems sturdy enough; the fact that he hasn't chewed through any of them in the first few days speaks well to their longevity. However, my one critique is that the plastic on the infinity shaped toy doesn't hold up well. That was practically disintegrated by the first night.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Scott

customer_reviews.title: Everything my dog needs at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is a little over a year old. She chews the heck out of everything. Never likes any of the toys we buy her...until now. This 5 pack has everything she needs. A yarn ball, and multiple rope toys for her to play with. They are durable and they were affordable. I very rarely write reviews,but I felt this was much needed. And, we ordered this during the pandemic and didn't expect to get this for a few more weeks, so the early arrival was the cherry on top! We will definitely buy from Otterly again (but hopefully it's not needed for a while!)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: There is no such thing as an indestructible toy for my dogs (pit bulls) but these rope toys are good because they are fairly heavy duty and the frayed ends can be cut off so they can continue to play with what's left. After the rope parts are destroyed the balls and knots can last a long as a month and the price is right so I can continue to replace them without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Charlee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for power chewers & long lasting, but extremely messy once they do start coming apart
customer_reviews.text: Ok, these toys are awesome!! Our dog is a power chewer and can easily go through most toys in a day. We have had these for almost 3 weeks now and I have not had to throw one away yet! She is always carrying one of these around the house or sleeping with one. Great find! UPDATE: Although these lasted a very long time, when they did start to come apart, she was eating the tiny strings and we were picking up strings EVERYWHERE. So, as much as I had hoped we would continue using them, I had to get rid of them. :(
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: I think they are a great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for the money! At chain pet stores, just one of the rope toys received would cost the price of the entire set. They are substantial. My 6 month old lab puppy (who chews EVERYTHING) has loved them. I think the rope ball is really cool. She goes through tennis balls like water and this rope ball, although it gets dirty, has stood up so far. I recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Our Labrador loves chew toys, but generally will demolish a toy within a 24-hour period. This pack of toys is a great value and contains sturdy toys, some which can also be used for tug of war between dog and owner (very fulfilling bonding activity for your dog). My dog also gets bored with the same old toys, so I like that I can keep this pack in the closet and offer him something new each week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia KSA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for my Husky/Malamute mix!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 80 pound, 3 year old husky/malamute mix. I got these for him and I am impressed. Especially for the price, you cant beat it. He chews on these constantly, throws them around, pulls on them, and only the circle one is showing any wear at all. We have had the toys for about 6 months now. They still look almost new (slobber happens). He loves them and I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah teh Noms

customer_reviews.title: puppy loves them
customer_reviews.text: Now that my growing puppy is now 5 months old, I gave her these since they are bigger than her previous rope toys. They had a bit of a smell when I first opened them, maybe from storage, but left them out for a few hours and the smell was gone. She really loves them, esp. the round ring and the long rope with 4 knots in it. Since she still has some of her puppy teeth, I think she'll have these for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These toys are large and sturdy, and the price can't be beat! I'd pay at least this much for ONE of these toys at the local pet store. I bought them for a large young GSD, and the rope we gave him this weekend is holding up very well. The ball on the long rope with the looped handle is great for flinging long distances for fetching. He will be enjoying these for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big dog approved
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased to receive these rope toys for my large dogs. I bought them for Christmas as a little gift and they are a big gift. Each rope toy is a large toy that my big dogs are so excited about. They couldn't destroy them in one day, or even 3, which is amazing. I highly recommend these rope toys for your avid tugger, fletcher and destructer.
customer_reviews.author: Eli G

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to tough chewer
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old pupper went through a LOT of rope toys. She can't be left alone with them or she will tear them apart within minutes. These have stood up to a lot of chewing and pulling and they all seem to be really study and she hasn't been able to chew apart the strings as easily, but not so tough that she would hurt her teeth on them. Definitely will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great assortment, and VERY durable. These are shared by my 90lb German Shepherd and my Great Dane puppy. Both are big chewers and like to play tug of war, yet the ropes have held together! The only one that has unraveled is the ball but I feel like that’s just the nature of the design. Still able to trim off the unraveled bit and they can keep playing
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a tough pup!
customer_reviews.text: This set is great - we have an 11 month old black lab who is really tough on her toys. She loves these rope toys! We can lift her off the ground with them and she plays tug of war with them and they have held up better than anything. She loves to be dragged through the house while hanging onto one end. Every morning she gets the tops with the knots and swings it around. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: At least there are 5 pieces...
customer_reviews.text: I saw another reviewer state it lasted 15 minutes, I will at least the second to validate that - I have a photo of my 7 mo old mixed breed pup - he must be a shark, because his teeth cut through this rope ring in 15 minutes. Might have been sooner, I looked away a while to work. I am giving this three stars for now because overall value still needs to be assessed with the four other options. I have my doubts that the other toys will be tougher or longer lasting. Standby.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great value! They are pretty durable and my dog loves it. I don't expect them too last forever cause I know my dog is a tough chewer (Dobe). I was surprised how big they were :)
customer_reviews.author: JuliaGulia

customer_reviews.title: Not for aggressive chewers!
customer_reviews.text: We had rope toys for our previous dogs so when we rescued two dogs I bought them rope toys. They’re very sturdy and a good size. I was hoping to play gentle tug-of-war with them and watch them play with each other. Within 5 minutes one dog had a rope toy shredded into strings. I put the rest up to bring out only with supervision then we put it back up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa V

customer_reviews.title: Not for strong chewers
customer_reviews.text: These rope toys are NOT for strong chewers. In less than 30 minutes, my 7-month old puppy completely destroyed them. I also had a bunch of lose string all over my floor. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Insightful shopper

customer_reviews.title: Definitely durable!!!! These are toys meant for super chewers!!!
customer_reviews.text: So my dog is notorious for destroying toys in 30 minutes. These toys have miraculously lasted a whole week and that’s not because she hasn’t been trying. She almost always has one of these toys and she’s always trying her hardest to destroy them and has not been able to. This makes me a very happy parent because now I get to save money on toys.
customer_reviews.author: Judith benavides

customer_reviews.title: Picky Dog
customer_reviews.text: We have a picky dog when it comes to her toys but we took a chance with this bundle because it was such a great deal! We gave them to her for Christmas and she was SO HAPPY. She gently took each toy one by one to her bed and then stayed there with them for the next hour. Thanks for a great product. Will be looking to buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: cbarbre

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these - especially the ones that "flop" when she shakes them. Well made, sturdy however, I do not let my dog just chew them. While I suspect they would last a long time we simply play and play with them together and then put them away for the next time. Will buy more - especially the floppy ones :-)
customer_reviews.author: E. Cassella

customer_reviews.title: Great value, ideal for 50+ lb dogs
customer_reviews.text: These are a great buy for $20, all of the rope toys are thick and sturdy, best for medium to large dogs in the 50lb and up range. The variety is quite nice - much better than trying to find something at thr local box store. We have a mastiff puppy that is growing each day and these fit the bill wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Our dog LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 month English Shepherd loves these toys. We give her one every couple weeks and she's always excited to get it. She found the bag on the closet floor when the door was left open and attempted to make off with all remaining toys. She's been playing with three of the toys and they're holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: We just got this last week, and my dogs absolutely LOVE all these toys! My big dog is a huge rope fan and had just finally broken her only rope that she had had for years, so this was a much-needed replacement. She loves the long dangly ones (classic and the one with the rope ball at the end), even though she is terrible at catching them (see video), but her and her brother (Yorkie) play with all of these toys nonstop. Awesome value, would recommend this to anyone who has playful dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W.

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I have a boxer and a pitbull. They're both aggressive chewers and ropes are their favorite toys. I've bought several multipacks, but my boys have them disintegrated within a day or two. All five of these are still in one piece (about 2 weeks after delivery) and they've been chewing and tugging on them almost nonstop. Update- I have purchased these 3 times and my doggos love them.
customer_reviews.author: ART

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for large mouths!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly think you're going to get the value for your money on this one. I have a smaller dog so I had to return this so, but I think anybody with a big dog like a pet for German Shepherd would enjoy this. It seems strong and sturdy. I had to return mine and get a smaller toy. Highly recommended though.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: but the quality and value is amazing so I had to write
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but the quality and value is amazing so I had to write. One of these at Petsmart would be $16 but here you get 5 pieces that are very high quality for $16. My 7 month old golden retriever may chew them up eventually, but she will definitely have fun trying and I hope to get months of play out of them. Buy!
customer_reviews.author: NJA in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great toys for puppy
customer_reviews.text: We bought these rope toys for my daughter”s Shepherd-Rottweiler puppy. They are the only toys she doesn’t destroy and really enjoys them. She loves them as a pull toy. I recommend them for all owners with a puppy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Nichelson

customer_reviews.title: My dog totally loves playing with me and the figure 8 rope.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has never tired of the figure 8 rope though we have played with it for 2 weeks. I tire and pass it off to my husband who plays with the dog until he is tired. The dog -- she's never tired of this toy. It is actually the only toy out of the pack we have tried so far. I want to have something "new" to pull out when she gets a little bored with this one. It hasn't happened yet.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Louise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Large German Shepard
customer_reviews.text: Quick on time delivery Perfect size for large German Shepard. Product is well made and holds up well to hard pulling and throwing. This is the second time we have ordered this product and we have not had any issues or problems with the product or seller. The ropes and balls get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: donnevada

customer_reviews.title: What type of chewer is your dog
customer_reviews.text: I loved the different types of rope toys that came in the 5-Pack. They seemed very sturdy. However, Heidi, a 50lb black mouth curr was able to totally destroy the figure-eight rope toy with the plastic X handle and rubber ball attached. I kind of blame myself, because I had wanted to play with her, as she loves to play tug. I did not see her grab the rope toy and run into the other room. When I saw her 10 minutes later, the rope was in shreds, the rubber ball was in pieces and half of the X was chewed and cracked. I will be part of her playing with the rest of the rope toys.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Pups Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: My pups love these toys! They did not stand up very long to my two lab puppies, and we have string everywhere! But to be fair, nothing has ever stood up to these crazy pups! And they love them. Every morning when we let them out of their kennels, they immediately run to their toy box and get crazy excited over these. So while I wouldn’t give them 5 stars for durability, I would definitely purchase this set again because my pups love them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how you can go wrong with this
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. 95% cotton parts good for cleaning teeth. There may be some issues with the hard plastic in the figure 8 toy depending on how your dog chews, but about the best dog tug toy pack you are gonna find.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn P Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pitbulls, and anyone who has even 1 can relate, it's hard to find pitbull status toys that aren't totally destroyed in a matter of minutes. These are super tough, real rope toys perfect for rough play, and then when they are in total destroy mode, they have their Kongs.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Love

customer_reviews.title: Decent toys for the money
customer_reviews.text: My determined puppy is making short work of the ropes on these toys. He's not a big jawed breed, but his sharp puppy feet are making the ropes fray quickly. I've been trimming strings to keep him from swallowing them, and each rope looks like it will last a month or so before needing to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great BUY!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this was a great collection of different toys for a dog who - bless her heart - had destroyed an entire range of chew toys! These have really held up against her gnawing teeth and they adapt to playing a variety of games with her - tug-o-war, fetch, hide-n-seek.... GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Dr.M.

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a full 2 days
customer_reviews.text: We gave the woven ring to our dog Marley not even 48 hours ago. It’s in the trash now because she completely shredded it. Strings everywhere in the house, and I’m a bit worried that she may have swallowed some. We obviously expected her to chew this, but we also expected it would hold up for more than 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: MeLissa

customer_reviews.title: Good Rope Toys
customer_reviews.text: I love the variability in these toys as I have a large dog and a medium size dog. They both love these toys! They love them so much that I've been picking up rope strings all over the house for the last couple of days. The knot ends have held up well but the braided part didn't last more than 10 minutes. Still a decent set of toys though.
customer_reviews.author: Snobowler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, even better value!
customer_reviews.text: We have a big dog who has a ton of energy, the kids use this product to wear him out. It’s very durable and comes with more than one in the package for variety, great value for the price. You can’t go wrong with this choice! Will order again for other products, thanks again. ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Overall great value for the money. My dog is a giant and he has been able to tear two of them apart in less than 24 hours. I honestly don't think the average dog would be able to though.
customer_reviews.author: terry r price jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, durable
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer at a shelter with about 10 large dogs and wanted to add more durable toys to the collection there. I honestly expected these to be made of cheap material and fall apart immediately, but I was totally wrong. First of all, I was surprised at how heavy they were, which told me they weren't as cheap as I expected them to be. After two weeks in the shelter being used by pit bulls and mastiffs they're still in great condition! Definitely a good deal at a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be very durable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: So far these have held up well to my dogs rough treatment. Several of the items she will have to grow into. The figure 8 with the ball over the role is a big hit and is an excellent item to teach her to the and pull. I'm sure these will last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great variety for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bundle to buy that I could give my dog about once or twice a month. This foot the bill. My dog really enjoyed it but he's gotten to a point where rope toys are easily ripped apart. The rope ball in this bundle lasted as long as the $12 once i bought from petsmart. Don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Adam D. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Not for Agressive Chewers
customer_reviews.text: The first one was destroyed in less than 24 hours. The remainder lasted maybe a week. Maybe my dogs are what they would call "Extreme Aggressive Chewers", but I don't think so. I have had plenty of other things that lasted much longer than these.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great products for price
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 month old black lab that is a chewer - and we have had these toys for almost two weeks with no breaking. Have had many other toys fall apart easily and I like that there was a variety in the bag. Highly recommend for puppy chewers. :)
customer_reviews.author: kpittack

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: These toys are exceptionally well made. Although not completely indestructible, they take a great deal of tugging and chewing from my 3 pups which range in size from a 13# terrier; 30# boxer mix and a 45# springer spaniel. Thanks for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Linfranjo

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Man i have gone through so many toys to find some that held up to my labs thank you so much finally found them will be ordering more my girl lab well needless to say she just doesnt play with anything and shes been playing with all of their toys since they got their package which by the way reallly excited them
customer_reviews.author: Michelle ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Great toys; not durable
customer_reviews.text: These rope toys are nice, but buyer beware: do not leave your "super chewer" alone in the same room with them. They will not hold up! My dog had the "ring" toy completely in shreds after less than 20 minutes! The most durable "figure-8" toy survived a little longer than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron AthmannTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: It does fall apart if you have a super-chewer
customer_reviews.text: My dog REALLY loved these toys and they were a good value for price paid. And I will admit, he's REALLY hard on toys...i thought they would be a little tougher, as they look like they are made for big dogs...he's only 56lbs, but he's really strong and each item only lasted about one day before he had it shredded and a big mess all over the rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Kautz

customer_reviews.title: Agressive chewers will tear through them
customer_reviews.text: I've got a 6 month old Australian Shepherd/Lab mix. He does tend to chew on them a lot (which is a good thing bc he's not chewing on anything else). He's ripped through about half so far. When these start to unravel, they go quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Tough Toys
customer_reviews.text: My aggressive chewer and maximum player especially loves the ball on a rope. The ring toy occupies him sometimes in the house. I haven't tried the others yet, but I suspect they will be attractive, too. P. S. my dog is kinda picky about what he plays with! These work for him.
customer_reviews.author: S. B. Wolford

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my two dogs - standard poodle and labradoodle. All told, about 150 lb of pulling power. They tug and tug and chew and chew and still these toys are like brand-new. A first! Definitely recommend them for a pair of big boys like mine, or for a strong chewer. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Nice package
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved all the toys that were included in this package. A couple of the toys are still intact. A couple of the toys which were either circular or oval in shape my dog chewed through. Overall I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: User32

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very happy and pleased with the rope toys he received from Otterly Pets and he said we should do more business with them..They are priced right.....good variety of toys... and ship quickly to us......Over all a good company and a pleasure to buy from them...( I had to write this as the dog can not type)
customer_reviews.author: budlite283 of Brownville Texas

customer_reviews.title: Not for chewers........
customer_reviews.text: My dog tore through the ‘ropes’ in a short time (20 minutes or less ). Making them fragment and put my dog at risk of eating the pieces. The vendor readily refunded my $ though
customer_reviews.author: gena deck

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love their new toys!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 large dogs are loving their new toys. I love the variety that comes in the package and how sturdy they are. My only concern is their are 2 ropes that have a plastic piece which our dogs tore up right away. This is not the fault of the product but instead the owner :( We purchased 2 bags in our order and so glad we did. Also we were expecting these to arrive May 5th but received this weekend. So happy with the early delivery. Would purchase again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT for Chewers or multiple dogs playing tug-of-war
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the price. If you bought separately in store, these would be MUCH more expensive. At least $5 to $15 per toy. Heed the warning that these dog toys are for chewers but NOT aggressive chewers. Thought it would be okay with my two Dog children but they had them tore up within 2 days of receiving. (One at a time) Didnt consider them "aggressive" chewers at first, but I was wrong... Little strings everywhere!! Will only be buying strong nylon toys from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Lema

customer_reviews.title: Great product... Just not for my Australian Shepard
customer_reviews.text: I guess I have a chewer❤️ He is a Australian Shepard and within minutes he has one of the five ropes Chewed. I will keep looking. GREAT product, just not for my dog😪☹️
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves these toys
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had these for a week, and our dog loves the toys. She has favorites but plays with all of them. So far they show no signs of breaking down, unlike some things we’ve given her from a local store that only survived a few days.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Seems solid.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for what you get in the bag. I was hoping my large breed puppy (Catahoula) would take to the rope material through the teething stages but didn't seem to care much. The rope with the ball attached is probably his favorite of the 5 but, if your dog likes tug/this texture, good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE these rope toys
customer_reviews.text: I have three adult dogs, two golden retrievers and one great pyrenees and two granddogs who live with me temporarily. They all love the rope toys and playing tug of war and keep away. The youngest granddoggy is really a puppy still at 9 months so he keeps everyone stirred up and playing. I will try to post pictures soon. Highly recommend these toys
customer_reviews.author: judi crockett

customer_reviews.title: Not for aggressive chewers.
customer_reviews.text: My dog actually had these distorted within the hour. BUT let’s be fair - she loves rope toys and has a powerful jaw. The toys also said they were for aggressive chewers - maybe this should be corrected.
customer_reviews.author: bflogal

customer_reviews.title: Actually has not chewed up any of the toys yet.
customer_reviews.text: My lab seems to chew up everything and I finally found some toys that he has not chewed up yet. Love the toughness of the ropes.
customer_reviews.author: Verna Heath

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: My pupper loves these toys. I haven’t seen him this excited in a long time. Seems to be very durable. I have a 5yo pit bull that loves to play tug of war and catch. The toys are holding up
customer_reviews.author: Sav

customer_reviews.title: Never buy ropes for dogs
customer_reviews.text: This lasted a good while however when they start to come apart throw them away immediately!! Dogs will eat the strings and they get clotted in the intestinal track
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - could be cheaper
customer_reviews.text: These are about as good quality as you could expect, they frey about the same rate as any rope toys you'd find in your avg pet store. I do think the price could be a little lower for what you're getting
customer_reviews.author: avc723

customer_reviews.title: Our dog is between 50 and 60 pounds and this assortment is great for his size
customer_reviews.text: We're doling these toys out one at a time to our dog. The figure 8 toy with the ball attached was the first one we gave him and it was a huge hit. Our dog is between 50 and 60 pounds and this assortment is great for his size. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: W Henley

customer_reviews.title: Not the most durable, but a good option
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to be interested in only things it can destroy so this is a good middle ground. These are kind of durable, but will not last forever. If your dog is only a medium level chewer it will be ok.
customer_reviews.author: timmah

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Dog tore them apart pretty fast but I only gave him access to one at a time, I also haven’t found anything he won’t shred yet (other than nylabones) problem is that he loves rope so much. These kept him occupied for a few weeks and given the fact it was a bundle pack and real cheap it was definitely worth it. There is no sick thing as an indestructible rope to Bobby McGee
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for Medium sizes Aggressive chewers.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent collection for my medium sized savage chewer. She had destroyed nearly everything I bought at Petco within days. I bought this box with the plan to pace out its after she destroyed each one but she has not broken one yet. Very durable fun toys. She loves the figure 8 the most and loves chasing the balls and the ring.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Rosenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Great ropes. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These ropes are helping by keeping me safe. My lab is 10 weeks old now and is a monster when it comes to chewing. They are standing up to his chewing. Have given him 3 of the smaller ones so far. Saving the 2 bigger ones for a few weeks from now. He is in a medium harness now so he will be ready for the other 2 soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jghill97478

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My 4-month old puppy loves these toys... especially the frayed ends of the rope I unfortunately which gets left all over the house. Awesome quality toys though and I would love to just buy a bunch of the rope balls by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sisters dog who is over often, and she loves them! 8 month old lab who is very capable of destroying toys that are not durable. These so far have held up very well! Such a great deal for a great variety of toys. Pup loved them so much, my sister bought a set of her own!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs will love playing with these, but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 7 month old beagle mix dog and she's been able to cause heavy damage to 3 out of the 5 toys (threw one away) within 2 months of having these. There have been times when she's swallowed strands of rope but thankfully she's been able to throw it up or have it safely digest through her system.
customer_reviews.author: LungK

customer_reviews.title: Keep our 1.5 yr puppy entertained!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toys, especially for the price. We have a high-energy goldendoodle (65lb, 1.5 yrs) who wants to chew all of the time. These still keep him occupied after months of play!! So happy that he has something to do. He chewed the ball off the rope right away, but everything else has held up great. Good ropes for tug of war too. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Rugged
customer_reviews.text: Plastic ball broke off after day 2 but the rope is solid and he loves to play with it without the ball attached. Very good value for the cost. We have purchased more expensive toys that did not last as long. Update September 22nd. My dog loved the toys so much that it was worth buying them again. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: My dog is an INTENSE chewer. The only item left is the rope with knots, I would say these served well. Lasted about a month for my pup(7-8months)
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: the rope they tore apart right away , the ball is good so fare ,the rest of the toys I have not given to them yet I have 4 Rottweilers so it hard to find toys they cant destroy . three are 6 mon. old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable-second time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 rescue pit bull mixes who normally destroy toys, and ropes are usually the most durable option for them. My dogs aren't the biggest chewers, but every $10 "durable" toy I bought them was destroyed within a day, especially if they had a squeaker. My one dog, who isn't a huge chewer liked the ball rope toy. I bought them originally over 6 months ago, and am replacing the few left that are starting to fall apart. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rosie loves these toys and so far she has not ...
customer_reviews.text: Rosie loves these toys and so far she has not chewed them into several pieces as is her habit with many of her toys. Our main problem is that since they are larger and heavier than her other rope toys, she can do some damage when she bites one end and shakes her head and the toy. For a 36 lb she is so strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kas

customer_reviews.title: Good Ropes!
customer_reviews.text: For the value, these are great toys. My two dogs are aggressive chewers, so I don't expect a lifetime out of these, but they are better than most. One of the toys has plastic on it and it didn't last a day, but the other 4 are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We have a chocolate lab. His weight is 100lbs. He is six so not so robust that he tears up his toys anymore. The toys are well made. They will last a while I am sure. He ( the dog) is quite happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tug ropes for owners whose dogs destory every toy they get. I especially like the ring as it has elastic built in giving it a much better tugging experience with my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Engle

customer_reviews.title: Great toys for a chewer!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! She's had them for over a couple of months & still loves playing with them. She's only one & chews a lot & she hasn't been able to tear these up or even shred them! Great toys!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my boys who love to play tug of war! These toys come in different sizes, which is perfect for my different sized pups. They love them, and they don’t fall apart easily like other rope toys I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

product_meta.title: Otterly Pets Puppy Dog Pet Rope Toys - Medium to Large Dogs (5-Pack)
feature_bullets: FIVE HIGH QUALITY LARGER ROPES For Your Best Friend - Perfect for Tug of War, Toss and Fetch Games, and Teething Dental Health. Built Tough to be Chew Resistant and Durable (but NOT Indestructible and NOT for Extreme Aggressive Chewers.. Aggressive chewers yes.. just not EXTREMELY Aggressive). Helps With Boredom Through Interactive Play WITH You. (Unsupervised Chewing is Not Recommended)

BEAUTIFUL UNIQUE MATCHING Custom Color Assortment Value Pack Set is Sure to Delight you and Your Dog. Variety Package Includes 1) 4 Knots 22.5 Inch Rope, 2) 6 Inch Ring, 3) Figure-8 With Chewable Rubber Ball, 4) 20 Inch Handled Thicker Rope With New Bigger Size 4.25-Inch Diameter Heavy Duty Rope Ball at the end, 5) 3.5-Inch Diameter Monkey Fist Rope Ball

WASHABLE 100% NATURAL COTTON FIBERS for Your Family Member's Health and Safety. Take Them Outside and do Jump Exercise With Your Hound Knowing That Cleaning the Big Strong Assorted Bundle of Toys is Easy. Outdoor Play Time Supplies Your Chewer with Multiple Benefits, Including Good Morale and Contentment
NON TOXIC Cotton CLEANS TEETH and MASSAGES GUMS and Can Help Fight Plaque Build-Up as Well as Help Prevent Gum Disease. Great Gifts for any Breed of Medium to Large Puppies
BACKED BY OTTERLY PETS No-Hassle Lifetime Warranty. Unsatisfied For Any Reason? Let Us Know and We'll Make it Right!
